needClass.en: Need a class to generate property

needPrivateAttribute.en: Need a private attribute starting with "_"
needPrivateAttribute.zh: 需要以 "_" 开头的私有属性

needPythonEnvironment.en: The plugin requires a Python environment. Please install Python and configure the environment variables
needPythonEnvironment.zh: 该插件需要Python环境，请安装Python并配置环境变量

restartExtension.en: The ColorPicker setting changed. Please reload the window to take effect
restartExtension.zh: ColorPicker 设置已更改，需重启插件生效
